Function readxyzr

SYNOPSIS

import __init__
 def readxyzr(filename)

DESCRIPTION

coords, names <- readxyzr(filename) function to read an xrzr or xyzrn file. The returned coords will be a 4xN array of floating point values for describing x,y,z and rt for N atoms, names will be n strings. All names will be empty string if the file does not provide names

SEE ALSO

__init__
